Entry.JapaneseText: 本当に、ゲオルギアスを復活させちゃって 大丈夫なのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Will it really be okay for us to resurrect Geyorkias?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……オレたちならゲオルギアスを説得できる……
Entry.EnglishText: ...We can get him on our side...

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、ボクもそう思うヨ……でも……不安なんだ。 もし、ゲオルギアスに認めてもらえなかったら……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, I think so too... But I'm still nervous. What if he doesn't agree with us...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>、信じるんだ。 自分を……そしてオレたちを。
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>, you need to believe in yourself... and the rest of us, too.

Entry.JapaneseText: ウン……そうだね！ ゴメン！ 行こう！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah... You're right! Sorry 'bout that! Let's go!
